1604066511_mirrored_eddiejibson_github.body: @HelloZeroNet sorry for being slightly offtopic, but since I couldn't find any relevant info and it's not big enough a reason to make a new issue, so: is ZeroNet portable (everything is placed inside one directory, including configs and user-generated data)?
Ah, thanks, good to know. Probably worth mentioning that in the readme?
